mapper.select:
select
from park where valid='1'AND park_name like concat(concat('%',#{parkName}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into park (park_id, park_name, park_address, park_detail, open_time, close_time, longitude, latitude,valid) values (#{parkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{valid,jdbcType=CHAR})
